activities.title: DY Patil Stadium
activities.description: A state-of-the-art cricket stadium that hosts IPL matches and other sporting events.

activities.title: Lunch at Gajali Restaurant
activities.description: Famous for its coastal Maharashtrian cuisine and fresh seafood dishes.

activities.title: Central Park
activities.description: A large urban park with walking paths, gardens, and recreational facilities.

activities.title: Wonders Park
activities.description: A theme park with miniature replicas of world-famous monuments and attractions.

activities.title: Dinner at Sigree Global Grill
activities.description: Renowned for its buffet spread featuring global cuisines with live grilling stations.
